data.title: SmarTone HK- M2M, Modules, Certification, SIM, Data Plans
data.meta_description: SmarTone HK is based in Hong Kong and provides M2M services on LTE,DC-HSPA,HSPA+,HSDPA,UMTS,EDGE,GPRS,GSM,LTE NB-IoT technologies.SmarTone HK M2M developer support information is also available at the website.M2M service platform is available through Jasper Wirless. M2M vertical markets focus for this carrier are Asset Management ,Telematics ,Telehealth ,Digital Signage ,Fleet Tracking ,Remote Worker ,Mobile Payment.
